actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for a 5-year extension of Hazardous Substance Superfund, and for other purposes.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the Hazardous Substance Superfund (the Fund), to extend the following for five years: (1) the environmental income tax imposed upon corporations; (2) the application of the Fund financing rate (of petroleum excise tax); (3) authority to make repayable advances to the Fund; and (4) the authorization of appropriations to the Fund. Increases from $11.97 billion to $22 billion the limitation on Fund taxes that may be collected.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a 5-year extension of Hazardous Substance Superfund, and for other purposes.
